name: Galaxy Warfare Free - space shooter
description:
Love space battles? Do you dream to surf the cosmos? Ready to destroy armadas of enemies and save the universe? Then this game is for you!

Key features:
* Complete 60 challenging levels
* Discover 10 kinds of spaceships
* Use 12 weapon types
* Explore many improvements
* Defeat 20 types of enemies
* Rate amazing graphics
* Share your achievements with friends in social networks
* Compete in Game Center

Protect the galaxy and defeat all the enemies!
